text: is it a known bug that "copy as HubL" in developer mode doesn't capture mobile styles, max_width, and vertical_alignment?
If that’s happening that’s not a great experience. I would contact HubSpot support as that does seem like a bug

Hey guys, I'm trying to build a custom CRM card meant to be shown on Company Custom tab in the middle pane. This card shall present all line items from all active (today between licence_start_date and licence_end_date) deals for the viewed company.
Is it possible using Table component described in CRM Development -> Extensions -> Crm Cards & Serverless functions? If not is there any other way to achieve that?
You could definitely use the stack component to achieve this i'm not sure you can filter the objects for the table component though
let me run a couple of tests real quick
And you could oviously build out your own website page with the iframe but it wouldn't be embedded for now just a modal popup
Yeah, I would like to avoid modals

<@U04DUMWKMGU> today’s table component was released as an MVP for CRM data tables, but it doesn’t allow filtering or surfacing associations that you are proposing. That said, you could use description lists or tiles or stack to represent the data. We are aware of the need for table component, and we plan to get it out next year. Do use <#C04A3FUK8HK|crm-development-beta> for future questions.
Thanks <@U03FJQPSC0Y> Will try with the mentioned components :+1:

It’s not perfect, but there are some workarounds that I’ve seen developers try, that you could explore until we give you a generic data table component

1. Use multiple description listss with direction as `row` 
2. Use a list of tiles with description lists inside it
If your dataset is small, it could work.
Yeah the stack component is what I was recommending, it works for me and isn't terrible especially if you implement search with the 'form' component

> isn’t terrible especially if you implement search with the ‘form’ component
Interested to find out if you have tried it.

Hey guys,
My name is Vishnu Aru I am a Software Engineer,
can you please help with the following?
I am trying to send an email with the template which has dynamic placeholders
and a button which is having a link to it. and I want to send a unique token to it which is generated by my java application. and after clicking that button we will verify the user with the help of a token
is it doable from the HubSpot?
